contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.subtitle: Here's how you can contact us for any questions or concerns.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to K.M.Construction. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

information_collection.title: Information Collection
information_collection.content: We may collect personal information from you such as your name, email address, and message when you fill out our contact form.

use_of_information.title: Use of Information
use_of_information.content: We use the information we collect to:
use_of_information.item1: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer service.
use_of_information.item3: Send you updates and promotional materials, if you opt-in.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

hero.title: K.M Construction in Cyprus
hero.subtitle: Our company K.M.Construction carries out a full range of construction and installation works for residential and commercial premises.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: We provide a full range of professional services in the field of construction, reconstruction and design.

descriptions.new_construction: Providing construction services in Cyprus in compliance with all rules and regulations. With us, you will receive a full range of construction services: from design to full implementation and commissioning.
descriptions.comprehensive_renovation: Comprehensive services for private and business projects: with us, your property will acquire a new look and a modernized technological solution.
descriptions.facade_works: The facade plays an important role in the life of a building: it is its protection, thermal insulation, and decorative element... And in combination with decor, it will not only please the eye but also be beneficial to health.
descriptions.floor_sanding: Modern solutions in the field of concrete and stone floors. We will offer the best solutions to make your floor better.
descriptions.concrete_injection: The injection method allows for the local filling of cracks in a concrete surface, eliminating leaks and restoring the waterproofing properties of the structure. Our company's specialists strengthen load-bearing structures without complex and expensive construction and repair work.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Each of our projects is unique and special.

cta.title: Want to start a project with us?
cta.subtitle: Contact us with any questions today. Want to know more? Write or call us!

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Us?
why_choose_us.subtitle: We provide professional construction services in compliance with all quality standards

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We use only quality materials and modern technologies

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Fast execution of work without loss of quality

guarantee.title: Guarantee
guarantee.description: We provide warranty on all work performed

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Many years of experience in the construction industry

project.cta_subtitle: Contact us to discuss your project
project.not_found_message: Unfortunately, the requested project does not exist.

descriptions.floor_sanding_full: Professional sanding of natural stone and concrete floors using modern equipment. We restore the original beauty of surfaces using diamond cutters and polishing pads to achieve perfect results.
descriptions.monolithic_works_full: Monolithic construction using modern concreting technologies. Our specialists perform work on the construction of load-bearing structures, floors and walls using quality materials and precise adherence to technological processes.
descriptions.extension_construction_full: Construction of extensions to existing buildings taking into account the architectural features of the main building. We ensure harmonious combination of old and new, using modern materials and technologies to create functional and beautiful spaces.
descriptions.roof_repair_full: Comprehensive roof repair with restoration of waterproofing properties and improvement of thermal insulation. Our work includes restoration of load-bearing structures, replacement of roofing materials and installation of modern drainage systems.

descriptions.concrete_injection_full: The injection method allows for local filling of cracks in concrete surfaces, eliminating leaks and restoring the waterproofing properties of the structure. Our company's specialists strengthen load-bearing structures without complex and expensive construction and repair work.
descriptions.new_construction_full: Providing construction services in Cyprus in compliance with all rules and regulations. With us, you will receive a full range of construction services: from design to full implementation and commissioning.

descriptions.floor_sanding_full: Professional floor sanding for natural stone and concrete floors. We use modern equipment and quality materials to achieve perfect results. Our specialists work with various floor types: marble, granite, travertine, concrete surfaces.
descriptions.concrete_injection_full: Injection method for concrete structure restoration. We specialize in crack elimination, waterproofing restoration, and structural strengthening. Our technologies allow work without demolition and with minimal operational disruptions.
descriptions.new_construction_full: Complete construction cycle from design to project delivery. We provide comprehensive services for residential and commercial construction in Cyprus, following all norms and standards.
descriptions.comprehensive_renovation_full: Comprehensive reconstruction and modernization of existing buildings. We perform full range of building renovation works: from demolition to finishing with modern materials and technologies.
descriptions.facade_works_full: Professional facade works include restoration, insulation, decorative finishing, and building protection from atmospheric effects. We use quality materials and modern technologies for durable results.
